welcome_message:
Hello,
Welcome to Ahmedabad University. We are here to help you plan a visit to Ahmedabad Univeresity.
registration_message: You are not registered with us yet.
registration_pending: Reply with 1 if Would you like to register
registered_welcome:
Reply with corresponding number to proceed with that request.
1: Get Gate Pass
2: Give Feedback
registration_name_req: Please send your full name in one message.
gatepass: Here is your gatepass show this to security guard.
registration_done:
You have been registered successfully with Ahmedabad University.
Your userId and password are this mobile number.
invalid_input: Sorry we didn't understand what you want to say?
when_leaves: We hope your visit was good
